attributes.action: Stop firework being sold all year around and only be set off on the 5th November
attributes.additional_details: I am sick of being woken up by fireworks and having to wait for it to be safe to let my dog out i know alot of people will agree with me when i say its not fair on people with pets that are afraid of big bangs it is also not fair on people having to calm ghere pets for hours before they settle again or have to sit with them why they are scared
attributes.background: With the amount of people buying fireworks and using them unsafely and alot of peoples kids and pets being scared of them i would like to get them stop from being sold all year around and beinf left off everyday of the week they should only be allowed on the 5th November

rejection.details:
In any case, we already have some petitions about this issue. You may wish to sign these instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/168663

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/158905

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/170122
